KYC Registration

KYC is one time exercise while dealing in securities markets - once KYC is done you need not undergo the same process again when you approach another intermediary.

Your PAN CARD NO .

Please Enter Correct Pan Card

(PAN card is necessary for investment in Mutual Funds .Please provide your PAN No.)

Your Aadhaar number

Click 'Continue' below to receive an OTP to your registered mobile

Your Aadhaar number will only be used to fetch your identity and address detail.

This information is required as per SEBI regulations for Know Your Customer (KYC) verification. No biometric data will be fetched, Stored or Shared by us.

By using Aadhaar KYC, you will be able to invest upto Rs 50,000 per year, per mutual fund company (AMC).

I have read,understood & accept the above disclosures

If You don’t have Aadhar Card

We will help you complete your KYC process easily and smoothly, even without your Aadhar. Just follow the instructions in the subsequent pages to get started.

If You have a Demat Account

If you have a Demat account ,You can start investing with your existing Demat Account .It will save your time and process of Kyc
